Text: Stripped is the title of a stand-up comedy tour by Eddie Izzard, and is a continuation of his style of comedy, full of "stream-of-conscious banter and predilection for nonsensical detours and frequent tangents."
Triplets:<Eddie Izzard
2:
--------------------
Text: Stripped (tour):  It has been called "not only hilarious but quite remarkable."
Triplets:<Stripped
3:
--------------------
Text: Stripped (tour):  As for the name of the tour, Izzard says he called it "Stripped" because"The heels got too high on the last two tours.
Triplets:<Izzard
5:
--------------------
Text: Stripped (tour):  The set is leaner, what I'm wearing is leaner and just focusing on what I'm talking about.
Triplets:<Stripped

--------------------
Text: Stripped (tour):  I'm talking about the whole civilization, trying to strip that back, as well.
Triplets:<Stripped

<Text: Stripped (tour):  If there is a God, his plan is very similar to someone not having a plan.>
